sections.text: Termination of continuing tutorshipA full or limited continuing tutorship shall not terminate until the decree is set aside by the court of the domicile of the person under continuing tutorship, or the court of last domicile if the domicile of the person under continuing tutorship is removed from the state.Acts 2024, No. 123, ยง1.
